alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued June 15 at 8:37PM EDT until June 15 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 102 expected. * WHERE...In Ohio, Monroe and Noble Counties. In West Virginia, Wetzel County. * WHEN...From Noon to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...High temperature and humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
